TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaValidator extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述驗證引擎。

span.span: Represents an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) Schema validation engine.

summary.span: 無法繼承 類別 (Class)。

span.span: The class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 請勿使用從未知或未受信任的來源或位置的結構描述。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 如此一來會危及您的程式碼的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 結構描述 （包括內嵌結構描述） 是本質上容易遭到阻絕服務攻擊;不接受這些未受信任的案例中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 結構描述驗證錯誤訊息和例外狀況可能會公開機密資訊的內容模型或結構描述檔案的 URI 路徑。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 請小心，不要公開 （expose） 給未受信任的呼叫端的這項資訊。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. 類別提供有效率的高效能機制，可根據 XML 結構描述以推入方式驗證 XML 資料。The class provides an efficient, high-performance mechanism to validate XML data against XML schemas in a push-based manner. 例如， 類別可讓您就地驗證 XML 資訊集，而無需將其序列化為 XML 文件，然後使用驗證 XML 讀取器重新剖析該文件。For example, the class allows you to validate an XML infoset in-place without having to serialize it as an XML document and then reparse the document using a validating XML reader. 類別也可用來建置驗證引擎，透過自訂的 XML 資料來源，或做為建置驗證的 XML 寫入器的方式。The class can also be used to build validation engines over custom XML data sources or as a way to build a validating XML writer. 如需詳細資訊類別，請參閱[XmlSchemaValidator 推入型驗證](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md)主題。For more information about the class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 並驗證旗標物件不會設定為預設值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，的屬性物件是`null`預設。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 如此一來，包含外部參考中的結構描述，import 或 redefine 項目不會解析預設。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public XmlSchemaValidator (System.Xml.XmlNameTable nameTable, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver namespaceResolver, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlNameTable nameTable, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver namespaceResolver, valuetype System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags) cil managed
Public Sub New (nameTable As XmlNameTable, schemas As XmlSchemaSet, namespaceResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver, validationFlags As XmlSchemaValidationFlags)

public: XmlSchemaValidator(System::Xml::XmlNameTable ^ nameTable, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ schemas, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ namespaceResolver, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaValidationFlags validationFlags);

new System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator : System.Xml.XmlNameTable * System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet * System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver * System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags -> System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidator

param.name: nameTable
param.span: 物件，包含原子化字串形式的項目和屬性名稱。

span.span: An object containing element and attribute names as atomized strings.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 物件，包含用於驗證的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: An object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas used for validation.

param.name: namespaceResolver
param.span: 物件，用於解析驗證期間遇到的命名空間。

span.span: An object used for resolving namespaces encountered during validation.

param.name: validationFlags
param.span: 值，指定結構描述驗證選項。

span.span: An value specifying schema validation options.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項建構函式。The following are important notes to consider when using the constructor. - 內容參數會複製到內部物件時或設定驗證選項。The contents of the parameter are copied into an internal object when the or the validation options are set. 如此一來，對輸入物件驗證期間不會影響驗證的結果。As a result, changes to the input object during validation do not affect the outcome of validation. - 如果就不會編譯指定的參數，其呼叫方法。If the parameter specified is not compiled, its method is called. - 參數是特別重要，以驗證`xs:QName`型別。The parameter is especially important for validating `xs:QName` types. 類別不會複製從範圍內的命名空間物件，但改為保留它的參考。The class does not copy the in-scope namespaces from the object but instead holds a reference to it. 這可讓新的命名空間加入至在驗證過程中的物件。This allows new namespaces to be added to the object during the validation process. > [!IMPORTANT] > 並驗證旗標物件不會設定為預設值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，的屬性物件是`null`預設。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 如此一來，包含外部參考中的結構描述，import 或 redefine 項目不會解析預設。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default. ## Examples 如需建構函式，請參閱類別參考主題。For an example of the constructor, see the class reference topic.

exception.span: 一或多個指定的參數為 。

span.span: One or more of the parameters specified are .

exception.span: 在編譯 參數中的結構描述時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred while compiling schemas in the parameter.

summary.span: 將 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述加入一組用於驗證的結構描述。

span.span: Adds an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema to the set of schemas used for validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法可用來模擬遇到內嵌 XML 結構描述驗證 XML 文件中的效果。The method can be used to simulate the effect of encountering an inline XML schema in the XML document being validated. - 參數的目標命名空間與 物件已遇到之任何項目或屬性的目標命名空間均不相符。The target namespace of the parameter cannot match that of any element or attribute already encountered by the object. - 如果未設定驗證選項，方法不做任何動作。If the validation option is not set, the method does nothing.

exception.span: 指定的 參數為 。

exception.span: 參數的目標命名空間與 物件已經遇到之任何項目或屬性的目標命名空間都相符。

span.span: The target namespace of the parameter matches that of any element or attribute already encountered by the object.

exception.span: 參數是無效的。

span.span: The parameter is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndValidation() cil managed

summary.span: 結束驗證，並檢查整個 XML 文件的識別條件約束。

span.span: Ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法結束驗證，並檢查整個 XML 文件的識別條件約束，如果驗證選項設定。The method ends validation and checks identity constraints for the entire XML document if the validation option is set.

exception.span: 在 XML 文件中找到識別條件約束錯誤。

span.span: An identity constraint error was found in the XML document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute[] GetExpectedAttributes() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回目前元素內容的預期屬性。

span.span: Returns the expected attributes for the current element context.

returns.span: 物件的陣列；如果沒有預期屬性，則為空白陣列。

span.span: An array of objects or an empty array if there are no expected attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果方法之後，立即呼叫方法，會傳回可能會出現在 XML 文件的所有屬性。If the method is called immediately after the method, all the attributes that could appear in the XML document are returned. - 如果方法呼叫之後一或多個呼叫方法，會傳回尚未尚未驗證目前項目的屬性。If the method is called after one or more calls to the method, the attributes that haven't yet been validated for the current element are returned.

span.span: An array of objects or an empty array if there are no expected particles.

span.span: An to populate with objects for any attributes not yet encountered during validation in the element context.

summary.span: 對預設屬性驗證識別條件約束，並針對先前尚未使用 方法在項目內容中驗證預設值的任何屬性，以其 物件填入指定的 。

span.span: Validates identity constraints on the default attributes and populates the specified with objects for any attributes with default values that have not been previously validated using the method in the element context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證目前的項目使用的所有屬性之後，就必須呼叫方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. 應使用 方法，判斷要將哪些預設屬性插入要驗證的 XML 文件。The method should be used to determine what default attributes are to be inserted into the XML document being validated.

summary.span: 略過目前項目內容的驗證，並準備 物件，以驗證父項目內容 (Context) 中的內容 (Content)。

span.span: Skips validation of the current element content and prepares the object to validate content in the parent element's context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 略過目前元素內容的驗證方法，並準備物件以驗證父元素的內容中的內容，它就相當於略過目前項目的所有子系的驗證，然後呼叫方法。The method skips validation of the current element content and prepares the object to validate content in the parent element's context; it is equivalent to skipping validation for all the children of the current element and then calling the method. - 如果順利略過，則目前的項目內容物件的 （如果有指定）屬性設定為。If the current element content is successfully skipped, the object's (if specified) property is set to . > [!NOTE] > 任何驗證錯誤會不報告已略過的內容。No validation errors are reported on skipped content.

exception.span: 未按正確的順序呼叫 方法。

span.span: The method was not called in the correct sequence.

exception.span: 例如，在呼叫 之後呼叫 。

span.span: For example, calling after calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks - URI 會報告任何來源驗證程序期間擲回。The source URI is reported by any thrown during the validation process. - 如果未設定屬性，XML 文件的檔案名稱是驗證錯誤訊息中。If the property is not set, the file name for the XML document is in validation error messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 驗證目前的項目使用的所有屬性之後，就必須呼叫方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. - 如果物件會傳遞至方法，方法會驗證對屬性物件。If an object was passed to the method, the method validates the attribute against the object. - 如果在目前的項目內容中，已成功驗證屬性物件的 （如果有指定） ， ， ，和屬性會設定與驗證的結果。If the attribute is successfully validated in the current element context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 驗證目前的項目使用的所有屬性之後，就必須呼叫方法方法。The method must be called after validating all the attributes for the current element with the method. - 如果物件會傳遞至方法，方法會驗證對屬性物件。If an object was passed to the method, the method validates the attribute against the object. - 如果在目前的項目內容中，已成功驗證屬性物件的 （如果有指定） ， ， ，和屬性會設定與驗證的結果。If the attribute is successfully validated in the current element context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果在目前內容中，已成功驗證項目名稱物件的 （如果有指定） ， ， ，和屬性會設定與驗證的結果。If the element name is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. - 如果在目前內容中，無效的項目名稱或其任意屬性屬性設定為; 否則為屬性設定為。If the element name or any of its attributes are invalid in the current context, the property is set to ; otherwise the property is set to . - 如果值不傳遞做為參數建構函式`xsi:SchemaLocation`和`xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation`屬性值會被忽略。If the value was not passed as a parameter to the constructor, `xsi:SchemaLocation` and `xsi:NoNamespaceSchemaLocation` attribute values are ignored.

summary.span: 對於具有簡單內容的元素，根據元素的資料類型驗證它的文字內容是否有效；對於具有複雜內容的元素，驗證目前元素的內容是否完整。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 元素具有簡單內容、方法會驗證項目的文字內容無效，根據其資料型別，並傳回的已剖析的具類型的值。For elements with simple content, the method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value. 項目的文字內容會從先前呼叫的結果取得。The text content of the element is obtained from the results of previous calls to . - 具有複雜內容的項目方法會驗證目前項目的內容是否完整。For elements with complex content, the method verifies if the content of the current element is complete. - 如果項目具有預設值，此值會傳回從方法是項目的預設值。If the element has a default value, the value returned from the method is the default value for the element. - 如果物件以建構值做為參數，識別條件約束規則 （如果有的話） 的方法會檢查套用至項目。If the object was constructed with the value as a parameter, the method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element. - 如果在目前內容中，已成功驗證項目物件的 （如果有指定） ， ，和屬性會設定與驗證的結果。If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , and properties are set with the results of the validation.

exception.span: 項目的內容無效。

span.span: The element's content is not valid.

exception.span: 未按正確的順序呼叫 方法。

span.span: The method was not called in the correct sequence.

exception.span: 例如，在呼叫 之後呼叫 方法。

span.span: For example, if the method is called after calling .

summary.span: 根據指定元素的資料類型，驗證此元素的文字內容是否有效。

span.span: Verifies if the text content of the element specified is valid according to its data type.

returns.span: 此元素之已剖析的具類型簡單內容。

span.span: The parsed, typed simple content of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您要驗證對`xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，或`xs:unique`識別條件約束，請勿使用方法多載。If you are validating against the `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, or `xs:unique` identity constraints, do not use the method overload. 請改為呼叫方法並將它傳遞項目的值。Instead, call the method and pass it the value of the element. 然後呼叫方法多載，其採用做為引數，以確認文字項目的內容是根據其資料型別有效。Then call the method overload, which takes as an argument, to verify that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type. 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 元素具有簡單內容、方法會驗證項目的文字內容無效，根據其資料型別，並傳回的已剖析的具類型的值。For elements with simple content, the method verifies that the text content of the element is valid according to its data type and returns the parsed typed value. 從具型別做為參數傳遞的內容取得項目的文字內容。The text content of the element is obtained from the typed content passed as a parameter. - 如果呼叫方法之前進行了，就會擲回。If calls to the method have been previously made, an is thrown. - 如果項目具有複雜內容就會擲回。If the element has complex content an is thrown. - 如果物件以建構值做為參數，識別條件約束規則 （如果有的話） 的方法會檢查套用至項目。If the object was constructed with the value as a parameter, the method checks the identity constraint rules (if any) that apply to the element. - 如果在目前內容中，已成功驗證項目物件的 （如果有指定） ， ，和屬性會設定與驗證的結果。If the element is successfully validated in the current context, the object's (if specified) , , and properties are set with the results of the validation. ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法一律會呼叫之前。The method should always be called before . - 必須進行驗證的項目的內容之前，先呼叫方法。The method must be called before proceeding with validation of an element's content. - 如果所有必要的屬性項目內容中不存在，物件的 （如果有指定）屬性設定為。If all the required attributes in the element context are present, the object's (if specified) property is set to . ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果項目具有簡單內容、 文字`string`指定串連每個呼叫方法，直到呼叫方法。If the element has simple content, the text `string` specified is concatenated on each call to the method until the method is called. 當呼叫方法時，會驗證所有的文字。When the method is called, all the text is validated. - 如果項目具有複雜內容，就會不發生任何文字串連。If the element has complex content, no text concatenation occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ValidateText(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlValueGetter elementValue) cil managed

param.name: elementValue
param.span: ，用於將文字值當做與屬性之 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 類型相容的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型進行傳遞。

span.span: An used to pass the text value as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute.

summary.span: 驗證在目前項目內容中是否允許指定之 物件傳回的文字，並在目前項目具有簡單內容的情況下，彙總文字以進行驗證。

span.span: Validates whether the text returned by the object specified is allowed in the current element context, and accumulates the text for validation if the current element has simple content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用時要考慮的重要注意事項方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果項目具有簡單內容、 文字`string`指定串連每個呼叫方法，直到呼叫方法。If the element has simple content, the text `string` specified is concatenated on each call to the method until the method is called. 當呼叫方法時，會驗證所有的文字。When the method is called, all the text is validated. - 如果項目具有複雜內容，就會不發生任何文字串連。If the element has complex content, no text concatenation occurs.

exception.span: 在目前項目內容中不允許指定的文字 。

span.span: For example, the method is called after calling .

summary.span: ，可接收結構描述驗證期間遇到的結構描述驗證警告和錯誤。

span.span: The that receives schema validation warnings and errors encountered during schema validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有指定，則使用的所有結構描述驗證錯誤，會擲回的值。If no is specified, an is thrown for all schema validation errors with an value of . 不會擲回的驗證警告的值。An is not thrown for validation warnings with an value of . ## Examples 下列範例會驗證`contosoBooks.xml`檔`contosoBooks.xsd`結構描述。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 此範例使用 類別，將 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案還原序列化，並將節點的值傳遞給 類別的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 該範例採用 `contosoBooks.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 該範例還採用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 做為輸入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ XmlResolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

summary.span: 設定 物件，用於解析 xs:import 和 xs:include 元素，以及 xsi:schemaLocation 和 xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation 屬性。

span.span: Sets the object used to resolve xs:import and xs:include elements as well as xsi:schemaLocation and xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation attributes.

value.span: 物件，預設值為 物件。

span.span: An object; the default is an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 並驗證旗標物件不會設定為預設值。The and validation flags of an object are not set be default. 此外，的屬性物件是`null`預設。Additionally, the property of an object is `null` by default. 如此一來，包含外部參考中的結構描述，import 或 redefine 項目不會解析預設。As a result, external schemas referenced in include, imports, or redefine elements are not resolved by default.
